metadata.name: The Frankenstein Zombie
metadata.description: The Frankenstein Zombie #1 - The Monster of Frankenstein finds himself in a world where he's no longer the scariest thing in the room when the dead rise to prey on the living. Will he join the zombies to exact his revenge on a cruel and fearful humanity? Or become an unlikely ally in mankind's war with the undead? We'll all find out in the premiere issue of "The Frankenstein Zombie."
